messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Gamers list
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Anne!  I told Connor(7) about this and he wanted me to sign him up. So, it took a lot of hoops to jump through to get him his own id on both hotmail and
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Anne! I told Connor(7) about this and he wanted me to sign him up.
So, it took a lot of hoops to jump through to get him his own id on both
hotmail and yahoo but we did it. Now he is known as gamerconnor. :o)

shannnon
-----Original Message-----
From: Anne O [mailto:ohman@...]
Sent: Saturday, September 18, 2004 5:23 AM
To: shinewithunschooling list; unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com;
Unschooling Discussion; LiveandLearnConference@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Gamers list


Hi everyone!

Jake started a list at Yahoo! for Unschooling Gamers.

PLEASE spread the word! He's looking forward to chatting with other
unschoolers about his favorite subject: GAMING!

Thanks ~
Anne

http://games.groups.yahoo.com/group/unschooling_gamers/
